Transgender people behind bars: In a prison of their own bodies

Story by Catherine Lindsay
Design and development by Yan Wu

One letter led to another, and another, until a story began to form. Corresponding with transgender inmates for over a year has revealed several systemic issues as well as controversial topics of debate.

Their struggle and the debate

Transgender inmates face higher rates of sexual assault and denials of the healthcare they say they need. Whether or not they should get this medical treatment is the subject of controversy.

Read more »

Their stories

Transgender people come from varying backgrounds, but often experience the same struggles. Learn more about their personal journeys.
